Work Samples

Edgewell Personal Care

(Senior Frontend Developer)

  • Lead developer on a small team that launched and maintained 12 Shopify ecommerce stores in 24 months.
  • Created standards ensuring compliance with WCAG 2.0 Level AA accessibility guidelines.
  • Improved Core Web Vitals metrics across all stores by an average of 25%.
  • Collaborated with business stakeholders to define requirements for new projects and features.
  • Managed releases, deployments and code merges in Jira and Bitbucket.
  • Enhanced SAP Hybris ecommerce stores, reducing page load times by an average of 2.5s by optimizing images, removing unused CSS from codebase, reducing JavaScript footprint and properly caching assets.

Survey Sampling International

(Front-End Web Developer)

  • Implemented front-end development standards for website performance and compliance with WCAG 2.0 accessibility guidelines.
  • Designed and developed Angular web applications to replace legacy CMS sites.
  • Trained non-technical staff to use Angular applications.

LifeCare, Inc.

(Front-End Web Developer)

  • Designed and developed a responsive framework for the company's discount shopping platform, increasing mobile utilization by 20%.
  • Defined development standards and optimization practices, including file minification and image optimization procedures, improving page load speeds by 10%.
  • Partnered with stakeholders to establish guidelines for creating workflows and requirements documentation.

LifeCare, Inc.

(Web Designer)

  • Built and maintained company's public-facing website.
  • Designed, produced and distributed LifeCare Connection, a quarterly sales and marketing newsletter promoting the company's new products and services.
  • Designed, produced and distributed LifeCare Account Manager Note, a quarterly newsletter to client representatives promoting service enhancements.
  • Designed and coded multiple custom landing pages for promotional campaigns.

Down By The River

  • Designed festival logo and charity bike ride logo for non-profit fundraising event.
  • Designed and developed web site to promote non-profit fundraising event.
  • Designed additional event-related print promotional materials.

B&B Cages

  • Designed logo and web site for baseball, softball and golf training facility.
  • Hand-coded HTML for site pages, using a responsive CSS-based layout and semantic HTML5 elements for optimal display across multiple platforms and devices, while also maintaining graceful degradation in older web browsers.
  • Additional print promotional materials.

LifeDesigns Functional Health Center

  • Designed and hand-coded a responsive CSS-based web site for fitness center, with a focus on creating content and semantic HTML for organic search engine optimization.
  • Added HTML5 video into featured content, with graceful degradation to Flash video for legacy browsers.

MovingWithHOPE, Inc.

Designed and coded website for non-profit organization in Shelton, CT. Additional materials include:

  • Additional event marketing materials.
